knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Load Libraries

```{r load-libraries}
# Load necessary libraries
library(PEcAn.all)
library(PEcAn.utils)
library(PEcAn.settings)
library(PEcAn.workflow)
library(PEcAn.visualization)
```

## Set Up Environment

```{r setup-environment}
# Set up the environment
options(scipen = 12)
```

## Read Settings

```{r read-settings}
# Read settings from pecan.xml
settings <- read.settings("path/to/pecan.xml")
```

## Run Workflow

```{r run-workflow}
# Run the PEcAn workflow
runModule.get.trait.data(settings)
runModule.run.write.configs(settings)
runModule_start_model_runs(settings)
```

## Visualize Results

```{r visualize-results}
# Visualize the results
PEcAn.visualization::plot.results(settings)
```

## Session Info

```{r session-info}
# Display session information
sessionInfo()
```
